name: UPatternTool_RotationSettings
doc: Settings for Per Element Rotation in the Pattern Tool

bInterpolate: If true, Rotation is linearly interpolated between StartRotation and Rotation values
bJitter: If true, Rotation at each Pattern Element is offset by a uniformly chosen random value in the range of [-RotationJitterRange, RotationJitterRange]
StartRotation: Rotation applied to all Pattern Elements, or to first Pattern Element for Interpolated rotation
EndRotation: Rotation applied to last Pattern Elements for Interpolated rotation
Jitter: Upper bound of the range which is sampled to randomly rotate each Pattern Element if Jitter is true
